description.value:
Multiple Resources:
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text * [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text * [Person](person.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text * [Patient](patient.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
